text: Michele Toma (born 9 August 1938) is an Italian wrestler. He competed in the men's Greco-Roman bantamweight at the 1964 Summer Olympics. Toma is a former athlete of the Gruppo Sportivo Fiamme Oro. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of Italy Category:Wrestlers at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Rome Category:Wrestlers of Fiamme Oro
title: Michele Toma
